column5: Home sweet home!  Newly furnished, upscale apartment in breathtaking lakeside setting, onsite gourmet restaurants, retail stores and Whole Foods market.  One king size bed, 2 sofa beds, complete kitchen and service area. Plus all the perks and amenities to feel at home: free covered parking, free Starbucks coffee, pet bathing center, fitness & yoga studio and conference room.  Only 5 minutes from The Cynthia Woods Mitchell Pavilion & Waterway Avenue.
column8: Home on the Lake - At The Woodlands best location!
